transcript.title: Congratulations to Australian Mens Hockey Team on Victory in Sixth World Hockey Cup Final
transcript.content:
Â 20 October Â 1986

I have sent today the following message to Alan Berry, Manager ofÂ the Australian MensÂ Hockey Team, in London:

Please pass on congratulations to coach Richard Aggiss, captainÂ David Bell and other members of the team on a brilliant victoryÂ in the Sixth World Hockey Cup Final. Australia's consistentÂ excellent performances on the international hockey field overÂ many years have been justifiably rewarded with this major trophy.

Please also pass on compliments to my colleague, RicÂ Charlesworth, on his outstanding performance in being voted ' ManÂ of the Series'.Â
